mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, ADDRESS, REGIST_NUM, REPORTS, ROLE) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{registNum}, #{reports})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, ADDRESS, REGIST_NUM, REPORTS, ROLE FROM MEMBER
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE REGIST_NUM = #{registNum}
SELECT ROLE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
